1.title: An Duibheagán - The Abyss
1.plot: In 1914 Ireland stood on the brink of a civil war, then World War One broke out and changed the course of Irish history. The first large involvement for Irish troops was on the fourth of August 1914, when Great Britain declares war on Germany.

2.title: An tIonsaí - The Onslaught
2.plot: Each month, more than a hundred thousand civilians sign up. The age limit is set at 41 years. 80,000 additional Irishmen volunteered in the British army during the first few months of the war.

3.title: An Phian - The Anguish
3.plot: Catherine Black is a main character of the episode which discovers how women, nurses, medicine and health were interlinked with the casualties of war.

4.title: An Dúil - The Heart's Desire
4.plot: We look at how the war affected relationships and families affected by the devastation of the war in Europe, thousands of Irishmen serving in regiments all over the Western front.

5.title: An Scrios - The Annihilation
5.plot: Thomas Kettle is an Irish soldier, through him we highlight the changing landscape and opinion to war in Ireland, and the effect of the war on Irish people.

6.title: An Baile - The Home Front
6.plot: In Easter 1916, a rebellion took place in Ireland. A group of rebels, loyal only to the freedom of Ireland tried to take advantage of Britain's distraction with the war effort.

7.title: An tÉirí Amach - The Uprising
7.plot: War weariness, poverty and social unrest created perfect conditions for a new Irish voice to break from the old one.

8.title: An Bhreith - The Tipping Point
8.plot: Over 200,000 Irishmen fought in the great war. Various reasons caused them to fight, but death spared no group on the battlefield. 30,000 Irishmen were killed in the fighting and Ireland was changed immensely as a result of the war.

imdb.plot outline: An 8 episode long historical drama series set in World War 1. The series shows the lives and experiences of real characters, brought to life from their own words and diaries, and with a focus on real life Irish characters. As part of a European wide co-production, the series is due for broadcast to commemorate the centenary of the outbreak of World War One which changed Ireland forever.
imdb.title: Dialanna ón gCogadh Mór
plot: An 8 episode long historical drama series set in World War 1. The series shows the lives and experiences of real characters, brought to life from their own words and diaries, and with a focus on real life Irish characters. As part of a European wide co-production, the series is due for broadcast to commemorate the centenary of the outbreak of World War One which changed Ireland forever.::Square 1
